body_html:
Pleas use the forum to ask questions.

In your case, the error message should be clear: in 'view()': size '[-1 x 400]' is invalid for input with 6304 elements. Since you have 6304 elements in the input, your can't view it as something by 400.
body_text:
Pleas use the forum to ask questions.
In your case, the error message should be clear: in 'view()': size '[-1 x 400]' is invalid for input with 6304 elements. Since you have 6304 elements in the input, your can't view it as something by 400.
body:
Pleas use the [forum](https://discuss.pytorch.org/) to ask questions.

In your case, the error message should be clear: `in 'view()': size '[-1 x 400]' is invalid for input with 6304 elements`. Since you have 6304 elements in the input, your can't view it as something by 400.
